name: Kitsune (gearless_june, Busy Hamster, PixiVan)
description:
Kitsune is a small metroidvania game where you play as a shapeshifting fox. Explore 3 different areas and discover up to 4 shapeshifting powers.

Please let us know if you enjoyed the game! (and any issues/bugs you encounter)

This game was made for Metroidvania Month 16.

Controls:

Basic:

E for minimap

AD to move

Space to jump

S to go down

Left-click to attack

Discoverable Power:

Right-click to dash (Fox)

Double-space to double Jump (Butterfly)

WASD to swim in water (Fish)

WS to wall climb (Spider)

Credits:

Programming, Music: gearless_june

Art: PixiVan

Level Design: Busy Hamster/Jeffrey
